text: All men of action are dreamers.
author: James Huneker

text: Justice consists in doing no injury to men decency in giving them no offense.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: There are more men ennobled by study than by nature.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: We must conceive of this whole universe as one commonwealth of which both gods and men are members.
author: Marcus Tullius Cicero

text: The worst men often give the best advice.
author: Francis Bacon
